com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.status

Interface CheckingStatusValue<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type

    public interface CheckingStatusValue<T>
    The interface CheckingStatusValue is a type-safe value for CheckingStatus.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName() 
      T getValue() 
      boolean isValuePresent() 
      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the value.

    • Method Detail

      • isValuePresent

        boolean isValuePresent()
        Returns:
        true, if value is present. For example: If you check without spelling it will return false for CheckingStatusKey.Keys.SPELLING.

      • getValue

        T getValue()
        Returns:
        the value, will not be null. Note: Use isValuePresent() to check if a value exists.

      • toString

        String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the value.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the value as string. If value is not set "-" will be returned. If value is a date it will be formatted as ISO 8601 (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss, for example: 2023-01-29T14:35:56)

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        the name, which should be displayed or written to file. In case of admitted terms, the customized admitted term name is used if present.
